content: The item is of a Legendary rarity as it is important to obtaining another Key Item, specifically the Loong Scales, which will allow you to access a number of secret areas and secret bosses.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pungent_Flesh_Chunk.md', within the main section titled 'Pungent Flesh Chunk'.
The content is as follows:
The item is of a Legendary rarity as it is important to obtaining another Key Item, specifically the Loong Scales, which will allow you to access a number of secret areas and secret bosses.
